title: Block list
body: Is there a limit to how many players you put onto the list? I kind of want to go for the record

replies.body:
Mine has more than my friends list (which is maxed out), so idk. 

I kinda wish we could add notes to see why we blocked them.
I know what my notes would say, "baited me into being toxic". I only wish you couldn't see blocked players chats in champ select
